title: i_am_viral
author: i_am_viral
content: Asked loan to pay hosting for endfb.com ( did not get nuthin) paid myself Asked loan to fix my phone ( did not get nuthin) . Ordered something  from Amazon for 6.9€ ( only had 10€ in bank) not knowing if it’s even the right thing and expecting odds of success of slim to none, but after 2 hours of heart surgery ( I mean phone surgery) the gotdamn thing appears to be working !Now need another loan for a small budget advertisement to add to endfb.com 50€ -100€ my 4 th advertisement

comments.author: i_am_viral
comments.body: Quote from: Chahan on June 23, 2022, 06:24:43 PMInsanity...doing the same thing over and over again but expecting a different result ...Imma become filthy rich and famous right in front of the piece of shit people that I never was

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.created_time: June 24, 2022, 07:15:58 PMLast edit: December 16, 2023, 06:58:05 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I want to believe you are just spamming on purpose because for someone like you who has been a member of this forum since 2013, you should already know that you are never going to get a loan with this kind of reputation.The forum is not a charity organization where ask for anything and get it, with how messed your account already is, who do you think in their right sense would want to give you a loan?stop spamming already.

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on June 24, 2022, 07:15:58 PMhttps://i.imgur.com/ulAC8hJ.pngI want to believe you are just spamming on purpose because for someone like you who has been a member of this forum since 2013, you should already know that you are never going to get a loan with this kind of reputation.The forum is not a charity organization where ask for anything and get it, with how messed your account already is, who do you think in their right sense would want to give you a loan?stop spamming already.Why won't they give him a loan? He has many MERITS

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.created_time: June 24, 2022, 11:14:21 PMLast edit: June 07, 2023, 06:12:23 PM by yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on June 24, 2022, 11:06:14 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on June 24, 2022, 07:15:58 PMI want to believe you are just spamming on purpose because for someone like you who has been a member of this forum since 2013, you should already know that you are never going to get a loan with this kind of reputation.The forum is not a charity organization where ask for anything and get it, with how messed your account already is, who do you think in their right sense would want to give you a loan?stop spamming already.Why won't they give him a loan? He has many MERITSHe has earned 7 merits since merit system was introduced, the other 100 were airdropped for him being a Full member at the time the system was introduced. The loan request is never gonna be given likely due to noone believes this user has the means to payback. If they had collateral then it wouldn't be an issue.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on June 24, 2022, 11:06:14 PMWhy won't they give him a loan? He has many MERITSGo ahead help our poor brother please, our Bitcoin millionaire, Our Bitcoin philanthropist.Give him some loan, 1 Euro for every Merit he has, that's 107 Euros, Right?  Shouldn't be hard, should it?

comments.author: 16xypjnxlrew
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 24, 2022, 11:15:38 PMQuote from: 16xypjnxlrew on June 24, 2022, 11:06:14 PMWhy won't they give him a loan? He has many MERITSGo ahead help our poor brother please, our Bitcoin millionaire, Our Bitcoin philanthropist.Give him some loan, 1 Euro for every Merit he has, that's 107 Euros, Right?  Shouldn't be hard, should it?Why then on the forum everywhere poke this MERIT? When I ask for a loan, they tell me that I have NO MERIT and they don’t give me anything, and they write to me that loans without collateral are issued only to those who have MERIT

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on June 25, 2022, 01:18:38 AMQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on June 24, 2022, 11:15:38 PMQuote from: 16xypjnxlrew on June 24, 2022, 11:06:14 PMWhy won't they give him a loan? He has many MERITSGo ahead help our poor brother please, our Bitcoin millionaire, Our Bitcoin philanthropist.Give him some loan, 1 Euro for every Merit he has, that's 107 Euros, Right?  Shouldn't be hard, should it?Why then on the forum everywhere poke this MERIT? When I ask for a loan, they tell me that I have NO MERIT and they don’t give me anything, and they write to me that loans without collateral are issued only to those who have MERITThat's a lie!!! If you are a newbie, without any sort of reputation on this forum, why should anyone trust you with a non collateral loan? You have 0 incentive to return the funds you borrowed. You could just disappear and lose nothing, while your loaner gets screwed over. Have some sense man.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: 16xypjnxlrew on June 25, 2022, 01:18:38 AMWhy then on the forum everywhere poke this MERIT? When I ask for a loan, they tell me that I have NO MERIT and they don’t give me anything, and they write to me that loans without collateral are issued only to those who have MERITIt isn't about merit, though. I was being cynical. No offense, but look at your profile. Even you would be afraid to lend a person like you a no collateral loan  Why do you need a loan in the first place? Are you dead because you didn't get a loan? You are not ! Live on!
